Text: SaM, Could please do the same upload in FLAC....There is no proper FLAC release of ARR's Kadal on the net. Please....Thanks a ton in advance. ARR's music deserves FLAC.
Both the  FLAC releases available on the net currently are upscaled MP3. Your's would be the first GENUINE FLAC rip...Please do it in FLAC.
Sam, The FLAC version is available at desitorrents. Please post it to TPB. Please....
